sentences.english: Asbestos, used as a flame retardant, can cause cancer.
sentences.chinese: 石棉用於阻燃劑，可能導致癌症。

sentences.english: Formula is an important impacting factor of the asbestos-free latex sealing material in performance.
sentences.chinese: 配方是影響無石棉膠乳抄取密封材料性能的重要因素。

sentences.english: Conclusion Amosite granular dust has the effects of causing carcinoma.
sentences.chinese: 結論顆粒狀鐵石棉粉塵具有致癌作用。

sentences.english: Packing and gaskets to be non-asbestos.
sentences.chinese: 填料和墊圈是不含石棉的材料。

sentences.english: The rifts at both installation holes of the silicon carbide rod ends shall be blocked by asbest rope.
sentences.chinese: 硅碳棒兩端安裝孔處的隙縫應用石棉繩堵塞。

sentences.english: They also must clear the stadium of asbestos — a potentially deadly killer if left uncontained.
sentences.chinese: 他們還得清除體育場的石棉，一旦任意棄置可能致命。

sentences.english: Our Non-asbestos Sealing Products pass across European technical check.
sentences.chinese: 我們的無石棉密封產品通過歐洲技術檢測。

sentences.english: Fiber Brucite is a kind of natural mineral fiber which is safe and non asbestos.
sentences.chinese: 水鎂石纖維是一種安全的非石棉天然礦物纖維。

sentences.english: Thank you for your aming, but my clothes are made of asbestos.
sentences.chinese: 謝謝您的提醒，不過我的衣服是石棉做的。

sentences.english: Objective To study the mechanism of damages of pulmonary alveolar macrophages caused by chrysotile asbestos.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討纖狀蛇紋石石棉致肺泡巨噬細胞受損的機制。

sentences.english: We took non- asbestos product for important developing direction in 2003.
sentences.chinese: 2003年公司把無石棉產品定爲重點發展方向。

sentences.english: This is because of the carcinogenic effect of asbestos particles.
sentences.chinese: 這是因爲在致癌作用的石棉粒子。

sentences.english: Preliminary Study on Pipe Joint Filler like Jute-Asbestos-Cement etc.
sentences.chinese: 油麻石棉水泥等管道接口密封填料的探析。

sentences.english: There is at present uncertainty regarding the hazard to health presented by crocidolite.
sentences.chinese: 目前，青石棉對健康的危害尚不清楚。

sentences.english: What WHO is doing for the elimination of asbestos-related diseases?
sentences.chinese: 爲消除石棉相關疾病，世衛組織在做何事？

sentences.english: Especially suited for premium and heavy duty asbestos-free applications.
sentences.chinese: 特別適用於優質的重負荷無石棉摩擦材料。
